Package controller

Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
controller.LoginController
public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object
A controller that handles the login operations of this application.

  • Constructor Details

    • LoginController

      public LoginController​(DataContainer dc)
      The constructor.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • authenticate

      public int authenticate​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Checks the validity of a username/password combination.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to be authenticated.
      password - The password to be authenticated.
      Returns:
      1 if the username/password combination matches a staff record, 2 if the username/password combination matches a student record within his/her allocated access period, 3 if the username/password combination matches a student record outside his/her allocated access period, 0 if the username/password does not match any record.

    • hash

      private byte[] hash​(java.lang.String passwordStr)
      Uses a hash function to translate a password into an hashed output for security reasons.
      Parameters:
      passwordStr - The password string to be hashed.
      Returns:
      The hashed representation of the password.
